entry.title: Thursday: Light snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this morning then mainly cloudy. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 late this morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 14 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 02 March 2023
